name: Lethe 0.1
description:
You wake in a hotel room with absolutely no memory and must unravel the events that led to this point.

Lethe is based on a script written by award winning science fiction writer Thomas M. Disch for 1986's Amnesia computer game.

This is an early release that only covers events before you leave the hotel.

Lethe is text and choice based. It should play well on mobile devices.  I've tested it on my iPhone, tablet and a variety of browsers on Windows and MacOs.
